articles.author: nutraingredients-asia.com
articles.title: B vitamins intake improves ankle, knee reflex and motor strength in peripheral neuropathy patients – P&G study - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: The supplementation of vitamin B1, B6, and B12 for 90 days has shown to improve ankle, knee reflex, as well as motor strength in individuals suffering from peripheral neuropathy, a 90-day study from Procter and Gamble (P&G) Health has shown.
articles.content:
Peripheral neuropathy is characterised by numbness, tingling, burning, pins and needles in the feet and hands.
It is caused by multiple reasons such as inflammation, alcohol misuse, infection, B-vit… [+6651 chars]

articles.title: China leaves benchmark lending rates unchanged; Asia markets rebound - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets started the week higher, while China left its benchmark lending rates unchanged.
articles.content:
Oil prices bounced back Friday after a selloff pushed U.S. crude into a bear market earlier in the week.

articles.title: 1st Nation To Establish Lunar Base, US Says China Could ‘Outpace’ NASA In Race To Moon - EurAsian Times
articles.description: US intelligence has publicly expressed apprehensions about China potentially outpacing the United States in the race to send humans back to the moon and establish a lunar outpost, according to reports. Washington and Beijing are actively competing for an edge…
